alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 6:48PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Charlotte, southwestern Lee and southern Sarasota Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 648 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Port Charlotte to near Pine Island Center to Lovers Key State Park. Movement was southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, North Port, Bonita Springs, Port Charlotte, Matlacha, Harlem Heights, Iona, Cypress Lake, Pine Island Center, San Carlos Park, McGregor, Pine Manor, Lovers Key State Park, Matlacha Isles-Matlacha Shores, Pineland, St. James City, Villas, Three Oaks, Saint James City and El Jobean. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Inland Lee
